notes: Removes enhancement slots from unslottable abilities & reworks dropdown enhancement-display logic to eliminate several bugs.
App previously struggled to default to a new and usable pool power after you added a new pool power but should be working now.
Adds versions to the app and tracks the last version you saw.
Adds notifications to update you on changes since you were last on the page (like this one!)
Selecting the active archetype will no longer wipe your build
